review: The Firestick is great.  But, there is an irritating high pitched loud click whenever you pause using the remote.
author: STEPHEN D MARCUM

review: Absolutely amazing!!! Very simple to install ,then sign up for whatever you want,then watch.
author: Paulette Irwin

review: Can't get Netflix/prime to work without constant buffering or error messages. Waste of money seeing as how it can't be used properly
author: Jeffrey Langford "BattleBladeWarrior"

review: The Fire stick is awesome! I had been looking for something that would allow me to view Amazon Instant Prime Videos, Netflix, and Showtime Anytime, with out having to switch between 3 different devices. And the choice of things to watch, is amazing! Now, if only some service,other than cable (or going with an over-the-air antenna ), would offer my local channels, I could really reduce my cable bill!!Thanks Amazon!
author: Susan Blackmer

review: Works great.  Easy setup.  Bought two of them and will replace my roku's with these on my other tv's when they die.  One small gripe.  I wish you could skip the introductory video on the first install.  Was repetitive when installing multiples.
author: Daniel A Paulovich

review: Works good.  Can download an app on your phone for voice commands/an extra remote.  Certainly makes watching Netflix easier than streaming thru our Blue Ray.  Watching Youtube on the big screen is good.  The kids like the download & play games too.  Was bummed it took 2+ weeks to receive.
author: NC
